printing.translation[0].definitions[0].d: the act or process of making a book, magazine etc using a machine that puts ink onto paper
printing.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an act of printing a number of copies of a book
printing.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The first printing of her book was 10,000 copies.
printing.translation[0].definitions[2].d: a method of writing when you write each letter separately rather than joining the letters of a word
printing.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the work of producing books, newspapers etc on a machine that puts words, numbers, pictures etc onto the surface of paper
printing.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Thomson is a printing and publishing concern.
The firm has access to printing and typesetting facilities throughout the UK.
printing.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the act of printing a number of copies of a book
printing.translation[1].definitions[1].e: The book is already in its fourth printing (=it has been printed four times).
